channelml.meta:notes: ChannelML file describing a single synaptic mechanism

synapse_type.name: GapJunction

meta:contributor.meta:name: Padraig Gleeson
meta:contributor.meta:comment: Note: This is not (yet) based on experimental data from C. elegans

synapse_type.meta:notes: Electrical connection from a cell. A generic GJ is used as a first approximation for all electrical connections
